metadata.name: Autumn Ivy over Stone Wall
metadata.description:
Transformed into its Autumn attire, ivy cascades over a stone wall in the Irish countryside.

Based on one of my original images captured during Autumn 2021, this artwork features a stone wall I see every morning from my bedroom window.

For many years, I've been privileged to enjoy this view during the changing light and colours of the seasons.

My obsession with the works of the Impressionist Master Claude Monet strongly influenced the style of this artwork, created through post-processing and AI to achieve the accentuated tones, lighting and brush technique.
